server.facade

Interface IServerFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockFacade, ServerFacade

    public interface IServerFacade
    The IServerFacade interface defines the class that when implemented controls all interactions between the command classes, the handlers, and the database.
    Version:
    1.0 Build Mar, 2016.
    Author:
    Christian Riboldi, Clayton Condie, Jacob Brewer, Joshua Powers, Joshua Van Steeter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAI(AuthToken token)
      Adds an AI player to the game given in the AuthToken.
      GameInfo createGame(boolean randomTiles, boolean randomNumbers, boolean randomPorts, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new game on the server.
      java.lang.Object executeCommand(ICommand command)
      Executes the given command passed into the Facade.
      CatanModel getGameModel(AuthToken token)
      Gets the CatanModel given the AuthToken for the user.
      void joinGame(AuthToken token, CatanColor color)
      Adds the player to the specified game.
      java.lang.String[] listAI(AuthToken token)
      Returns a list of AI that are part of a given game.
      GameInfo[] listGames()
      Returns information about all of the current games on the server.
      void loadGame(java.lang.String fileName)
      This method is for testing and debugging purposes.
      void login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Logs the caller in to the server.
      void register(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Creates a new user account and logs the caller into the server as the new user.
      void saveGame(int gameId, java.lang.String fileName)
      This method is for testing and debugging purposes.
